generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending into the distance, flanked by parked cars and sidewalks.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on the paved areas next to the road, separated from the traffic by curbs and trees.
- building: Multiple buildings with windows and commercial signage are visible along both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves line both sides of the road, and some bushes are visible near the sidewalk.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalks, including one person in a red shirt near the center of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along both sides of the street, and one car is visible driving in the distance.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including parking signs (P) and a "30 ZONE" sign, mounted on poles along the street.
- pole: Several poles are visible, supporting traffic signs and streetlights, along the sidewalks.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk near the right side of the road.
